data.title: The Rapture and Resurgens
data.meta_description:
The Rapture and Resurgens by Seagulls, released 20 October 2023

1. In the Beginning
2. Four Long Years
3. The Least of Us
4. Brand New World
5. Sinners in the Hands of an Absent God
6. Mogul Down
7. The Gooder News
8. Symphony for the Righteous Destruction of Humanity in E Major
9. A Brief Respite
10. Antediluvian
11. De Fournier Pilote
12. HELLHOLEBOOB
13. Laughing
14. Set Up to Fail
15. A Tale Told by an Idiot
data.text:
1.

In the Beginning 01:08

They thought they'd steal the election / we fucking caught them red handed / instead of just a slap on the wrist / we fucking cut their hands off. // They cried in mortal terror / all their evil hadn't prepared them / for a populace sick of their shit / whose patience had ran out. // In the beginning / we could have seen it as an honest mistake / but over time / we saw your hate.

2.

Four Long Years 02:40

Four long years we've been waiting / four long years our friends were scared / four long years of seeing true colors fly / four long years expelling family / four long years sorting through lies / four long years and it's finally our time. // Can you believe the shit they fed us? / Can you believe we ate it up? / Can you believe how long they got away with it? / It's some rich fucks wanting power at anyone's expense / and their uppins will be coming soon enough. // The hypocrites, the sycophants, the willfully ignorant / you've dug a grave for yourselves. / The charlatans, the born agains, snake handling lunatics / by our hands you'll meet your god. // Arrogant motherfucker / thought he'd weasel out of it’ll / be on the business end first. / Cut off both his thumbs and tongue / then death by a thousand cuts / as his disciples watch in awe.

3.

The Least of Us 02:36

We kept our cool for a day or two as we figured out what to do / our bloodthirst stayed with calm and reason. / Out of the planning stage we made haste, the goober state first in line, / we won't stop 'til we find everyone complicit. // "Bring them the world they brought on the least of us?" / "Bring them the world they brought on the least of us." // You heard someone heard from someone who heard that we'd been considering mercy / Well that someone - they heard wrong. / Dude, the irony isn't lost on me - that was your justification forever - Your god can't save you now. // For every time you were in a place to speak up, but instead followed your flock / For every life destroyed from your neglect, marred by your shitty book: / Today begins the reclamation. By any means we'll salt your earth. / You may ask, "Why do I deserve this?" Well, your god was a dick first. // They let you breathe and ignore. / They let you pray and ignore. / They let you judge and ignore. / They let you lick the boot of anyone invoking their name. // Let’s see how well they float. / Let’s see how well they fly.

4.

Brand New World 02:14

It's a hell of a time to repent when you're on the chopping block. / Thin metal quickly descends and then the lights go off. / Every shit move that you made and witnessed plays back in a moment of time, / for every platitude you'd rotely say you missed the plank in your own eye. // Heads roll sweetly to their end, blood hosed off and down the drain. // If your faith causes you to be shit it's not just your faith's fault. / There's a shitty person hiding inside and they need to be cut off. // There's a reason for the culling: / what was up must come crashing down. / Notwithstanding consequences - we're trying out a brand new world. // We take it all on ourselves- judge, jury, executions / One by one you meet your fate- it's not pretty but it gets done. / Our hubris ensures our progress and trust in what we're told / for the sake of time, fuck checks and balances- we're way too right to fail. // Ignore your own intense malaise- this time end justifies the means. // Surely nothing bad can happen. / In the end we'll leave no stone unturned. / It's no small bit genocidal- we're trying out a brand new world.

5.

We're somewhere between the start and the end of it all. / If you thought things were bad just wait for what's in store. / First we came for the christians, next: corrupt politicians, then we burn the whole thing down. // It'll get way way worse before it gets better / no telling how worse way worse is. / With any sense we would've stopped long ago, / but we're too fucking proud to take the loss. // You didn't ask for this- you were brought up to believe it. / I didn't ask for it either. / This just the consequence of stupid thought experiments and seeing them to their end. // If we tell ourselves that we're right enough times - we’ll start to believe it. / We're starting to believe it.

6.

Mogul Down 01:51

All's now quiet in the west wing / there's signs of struggle everywhere: / fingernails ripped off in the carpet, / scuff marks from feet kicking at walls. / We're all gathered at the south lawn / to make sure we don't miss a thing. / Evil fucker gets what he earned / along with his whole family. // They raised concerns but I really don't care, do u? // In our haste to pass down judgement / we "forgot" to hone the blades. / It's not enough to know they're dead / we want to hear pained, gargled screams. / Circle up, face them inward, / put them on their fucking knees. / For their crimes against humanity we’ll fucking hack them down like trees. // They begged as they watched / their kin fall one by one / sans dignity / we showed no sympathy. / I really don't care, / you really don't care, / we really don't care, / I really don't care, do u?

7.

The Gooder News 03:14

Bodies strewn across the landscape / heads on pikes for all to see / "Here's our sacrifice, our attempt to save the world from itself." / Our smug faces read arrogance, / our giddy shrieks betray bloodlust. / There's a lesson here, but it's something we forgot // We feign that this was our intent: / To gain a ruined earth already spent. / Eye plucked out and cast away / too little too late. // Commence finger pointing for every unheeded warning. / We're not the first ones with bright ideas. / We had a feeling that we didn't go far enough / while there's still humans breathing. / So close and yet so far. // There's no hope, here comes extinction. / We'll dance into oblivion. / It sure was fun while it lasted, / but I'm pretty stoked it's done.

8.

There's a billboard taking up the whole horizon / and cement as far as I can see. / There's black clouds in the sky blocking all the sunlight / there's only poison left to breathe. // In the end we'll all get what we deserve. // My skin is melting off from the acid rain and salt water is all that's left to drink. / Every thing I ever loved died before me excruciatingly. // Til every mall turns back to forest / and every church rots to the ground, / every eyesore falls to ruin / and a plague takes us all out- // In the end we'll all get what we deserve. //

9.

A Brief Respite 00:44

10.

Antediluvian 02:34

If you can kick and scream this loud I can easily stay the course / keep doing what I do best and wait for something constructive / Somewhere along the way you christened yourself a deity / and I can't say I'm surprised it's working out so far. // You take a backseat to anyone that'll take the front, ride the coattails until you feel like getting off, take the easiest route you can call your own. // A thousand reasons to stay a stick in the mud- why move when you’re cozy, safe, and cool? / If you stick your neck out your head’ll probably get cut off. Sink and sleep forever in the same old song // You wanna think no one has been here before? Try all you want but you can't ignore tales flying in from every direction. / It seems the more of yourself you give the more you wind up disappointed so apathy reigns motherfucking supreme. //

11.

De Fournier Pilote 01:28

It's probably nothing but I'm dwelling all the same, / to me this kind of shit means everything. / Anxious days and restless nights spent miffed as hell though I paid lip service to forgiveness. // You let it slide, say you're alright, you're not like that all the time / you know full well that deep inside you're lying / and you're not quite strong enough to keep it up / and it takes everything you have to let it go // Lights switched off, keys in hand, with one foot out of the door / I'm still clutching my resignation. / Maybe somehow it deserves another shot / with all the sweat and tears I invested.

12.

HELLHOLEBOOB 02:35

The streets are cracked outside my yard / broken by the steel there lays / the grass so green. / Just like me / so unhealthy so unclean / so I’ll waste away in this hell. // Come over to our busted house it’s closer. / You hear the rats in the walls / and ditch your best friends now I’m sober... half the time. // Every friend I know / every second of this song / it’s rotting from the inside out. / Just like this old torn up house- / just like the candy taste in our mouths- / it’s just like heaven but we’ll face south.

13.

Laughing 03:01

14.

Set Up to Fail 02:32

I can barely get to sleep at night- / not so subtle regrets go racing through my mind. / I know all the cards that I left on the table yesterday. // I'm grasping at any old excuse, (like i'm gonna) / I've got every shitty alibi (admit it's my fault) / for every crime committed, for every act of cruelty // We're set up to fail / we can't help but thinking we're invincible / when the odds are stacked against us, we find the worst way out. / We're set up to fail - / even our greatest feats are correlational / try as we might, at anything, our luck will soon run out. // We had time to talk shit / and to prove ourselves; / Time to talk big - fuck anyone else; / Time to ride high - straight to hell (straight to hell). // I’m slowly wasting away in place. (Always thought I'd) / Never making progress, never slowing down. (never slow down) / I'm turning into nothing- like a candle burning at both ends.

15.
